skins.shipDescription: King George V-class battleship C Prince of Wales, Hull Number 53!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the second ship of the King George V-class battleships, the Prince of Wales. I once escorted the Prime Minister to sign the Atlantic Charter. Making my mark in the history books of weaponry? Hmph, how dare you mention that in front of me.
skins.acquisition: You're the Commander? Very well. I, Prince of Wales, shall let you witness my true strength.
skins.login: Welcome back. Shall we have tea before getting back to work?
skins.details: Fate can be easily derailed, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Expensive isn't always better, but it's your job to maximize our combat capability, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I don't want to suffer the pain of losing my comrades again...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Would you like to have some tea? I have also prepared some sandwiches. By the way, I am a fan of pickles.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You know what doing this means right? *Smiles*

skins.shipDescription: I'm not a big fan of beach volleyball, but Hood begged me... I swear, that girl! She just can't get enough of the sun! You've got to cheer for me!
skins.acquisition: Although I don't really want in on the beachball game, but it was a request from Hood....That sun-loving girl. Don't forget to cheer for me!
skins.login: To truly experience the charm of all things, first one must sincerely love them. Commander, the same goes for girls too.
skins.details: Regardless of the time and situation, to ignore a fair maiden is most ungentlemanly.
skins.secretaryIdle1: How's my swimsuit, Commander? Haha, let me teach you how to compliment a girl in this kind of situation.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, leave all the admin stuff to me. Everyone else is waiting for you on the beach!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hood, you should get some sun once in a while too, you know.
skins.secretaryTouch: Yamashiro looked pretty depressed after she lost the ball game... Commander, why don't you go and comfort her?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Do you need me to teach you how to properly treat girls?

skins.shipDescription: I've been wearing Royal attire my whole life, so a change in pace doesn't seem bad. Oh, Commander, good timing. Can you explain to me how to celebrate the New Year here?
skins.acquisition: I've been wearing Royal attire my whole life, so a change in pace doesn't seem bad. Oh, Commander, good timing. Can you explain to me how to celebrate the New Year here?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, are you cold? You can borrow my coat if you'd like. Ah, don't worry about me, I'm fine.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Learning about the customs of the other nations is quite interesting. I feel like I get along better with the Sakura girls now.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I miss my black tea a bit, but I suppose "when in Rome, do as the Romans do." I guess I should fully enjoy the culture of the Sakura Empire.
skins.secretaryTouch: Why are you staring at me? I'm... suave? Hehe, I suppose I should take that as a compliment.

skins.JPClientName: 压冥违鹰トリ`レ`シング
skins.shipDescription: Oh, Commander. Worry not. Since I've been given this job, I will see through it until the end. Besides, it's been a while since I've gotten this fired up. Haha!
skins.acquisition: Oh, Commander. Worry not. Since I've been given this job, I will see through it until the end. Besides, it's been a while since I've gotten this fired up. Haha!
skins.login: Oh, you're back. Did you run into any of my sisters on the way here?
skins.details: While destiny tends to fly off the rails pretty often, flying off the course during a match would be a major accident. Commander, be careful while you watch the match.
skins.secretaryIdle1: The Manjuus drive these things... Sure, it's a mystery how they're able to turn the steering wheel, but I'm more curious about how they're able to step on the accelerator...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Whether in a match or in a battle, a machine's or ship's capability isn't everything. Depending on the driver's skill or the commander's directions, the course of the match or battle can be completely reversed. Hehe, that's exactly what makes betting fun.
skins.secretaryIdle3: These clothes make eating quite difficult... Oh, I give up. Commander, you can have the rest of my sandwich.
skins.secretaryTouch: Does something about this outfit bother you?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Heh, I won't let you go any further.
